title: shrI dakSiNAmUrtim Isham
sahitya:
shrI dakSiNAmUrtim Isham cidprakAsham praNaumi


anupallavi

 vEdAnta vEdyam nyagrOdha vrksha mUla vAsinam vallakI 
nAdAnubhava mOdamamrta phEnadyuti mandasmita mukhAmbujam


caraNam   jananAdi khEda bhanjana caturam jagadIndrajAla camatkrti karam 
munijanAdi nikhila samshaya haram mudrAkaram guruguhAkaram 
anAdya vidyA tamO bhAskaram AcArya shEkharam sundram 
manOvAga gOcara shashidharam mauninam madana haram shankaram
